text: Mec on þissum dagum deadne <ofgeafun> fæder ond modor; ne wæs me feorh þa gen, ealdor in innan.
Þa mec <an> ongon, welhold mege, wedum <þeccan>, heold ond freoþode, hleosceorpe wrah <swa> arlice swa hire agen bearn, oþþæt ic under sceate, swa min gesceapu wæron, ungesibbum wearð eacen gæste.
Mec seo friþe mæg fedde siþþan, oþþæt ic aweox, widdor meahte siþas asettan.
Heo hæfde swæsra þy læs suna ond dohtra, þy heo swa dyde.
